scripts.cypress:run-local: rimraf cypress/reports & npx cypress run --quiet --headless --browser chrome --reporter mochawesome & npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/reports/*.json" -o cypress/reports/mochawesome.json & npx marge cypress/reports/mochawesome.json -f report -o cypress/reports/mocha
scripts.cypress:run-pipeline: rm -rf cypress/reports && npx cypress run --quiet --headless --browser chrome --reporter mochawesome && npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/reports/*.json" -o cypress/reports/mochawesome.json && npx marge cypress/reports/mochawesome.json -f report -o cypress/reports/mocha
